description: A team of scientists are thrust into a potentially life-or-death situation after being deployed to the Arctic to secretly investigate what could be a disease outbreak.
title: Pilot

description: Dr. Farragut and his team work to treat the outbreak, while a rebellion erupts at the Arctic Biosystems base.
title: Vector

description: The team thinks they've got the virus contained, but deadly secrets and intrigue fester and spread as quickly as the virus.
As the crisis heightens and Walker tries to survive on Level R, suspicions grow as the team keeps secrets from each other.
title: Single Strand

description: Suspicion and death stalk the base; team members begin to realize that no one is quite who they seem to be.
title: The White Room

description: Alan and Jordan make progress in decoding the virus; Hatake cures Walker before the corporation's helicopter arrives.
title: Aniqatiga

description: Daniel makes a discovery; Hatake protects Walker from Sutton's mercenaries.
title: Survivor Zero

description: The vectors attack and take Peter's body; Walker is held prisoner by Sutton after the true nature of Sutton's relationship with Hatake is revealed.
title: Bloodline

description: Unlikely alliances are formed; Alan and Walker undertake a dangerous mission.
title: Level X

description: Alan and Walker journey to an abandoned satellite station and discover the truth behind Hatake's plan.
title: Fushigi

description: Peter leads the vectors in an assault on the base, and that's just the start of the problems.
title: Black Rain

description: The Scythe wages war on the base survivors, while Hatake is faced with an impossible choice.
title: The Reaping

description: Alan attempts to avert global disaster by battling The Scythe.
title: Dans L'Ombre
